error_messages.difficulty_less_than_0: The difficulty level is lower than 0. The difficulty level will be set to 0
error_messages.difficulty_nonexistent: The selected difficulty level doesn't exist. The max difficulty level will be set
error_messages.min_value_greater_than_max: Max value has to be bigger than min value
error_messages.undefined_face_image: The selected reset button image doesn't exist
